thread.title: trudy
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by trudy

author: trudy
title: trudy
text: I ordered a metal picture frame and received it promptly. It is a high quality frame at a very reasonable price. The frame was so well wrapped that it would be next to impossible to have it damaged in shipment. Amazon could learn a few things from them. I believe American Frame is a great company for your framing needs.
